entries.waypoint_description_1: This is where a cave of outcast Nightsisters is rumored to live.
entries.player_sorry: I have not managed to do your mission yet but I will get right on it.
entries.player_reset: I can't do it right now, very sorry.
entries.player_2_1: It sounds like I would need more assistance with me than I have right now. I will have to say no for now.
entries.npc_reward_1: I suppose this could help, we will get right to planning what we have to do next.
entries.npc_reset: Apologies won't help me! Get out of here and don't come back until you're of any use to me!
entries.npc_noloc_1: I don't have time for you, get out of here!
entries.npc_failure_1: You're just as useless as I thought!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Hurry! I didn't say you could slack on this important task did I?!
entries.npc_4_1: They are an abomination! They don't even befriend the Rancor and are a disgrace to our entire sisterhood!
entries.npc_3_1: Fine! Find the help you need and come back when you have it.
entries.npc_2_1: Excellent. They are located in this area, find out as many details as you can and hurry back.
entries.npc_1_1: There's an abomination of a clan that holds fortress in a cave near the Great Canyon. We need someone to scout out this place for a weakness in their defenses. These heretics must be eradicated!
entries.next: I don't have time for you, get out of here!
entries.cant_work: You should finish your current tasks before bothering me, now get out!
